mapper.update: UPDATE album SET name=#{name}, release_date=#{releaseDate}, region=#{region}, style=#{style}, intro=#{intro} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT alb.id, alb.name, alb.artist_id, alb.region, alb.style, alb.intro, alb.play_count, alb.release_date, alb.image, art.name artist_name FROM ( SELECT * FROM album WHERE name LIKE "%"#{name}"%" ) as alb LEFT JOIN artist as art ON alb.artist_id=art.id ORDER BY alb.play_count DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{count}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM album WHERE name LIKE "%"#{name}"%"

SELECT alb.id, alb.name, alb.artist_id, alb.region, alb.style, alb.intro, alb.play_count, alb.release_date, alb.image, art.name artist_name FROM album as alb LEFT JOIN artist as art ON alb.artist_id=art.id WHERE alb.id=#{id}

SELECT s.id, s.name, s.album_id, alb.name album_name, s.artist_id, art.name artist_name, s.play_count, s.lyrics_path, s.image, s.release_date, s.language, s.style, s.file_path, s.region FROM song as s LEFT JOIN album as alb ON s.album_id=alb.id LEFT JOIN artist as art ON alb.artist_id=art.id WHERE s.album_id=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM song WHERE album_id=#{id}
SELECT image FROM song WHERE id=#{id}
